sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function LatestJobCards({job}) { const navigate = useNavigate(); return (
navigate(`/JobDescription/${job?._id}`)}>
{job?.company?.name}

India

{job?.title}

{job?.description}

{job?.position} Positions
{job?.jobType}
{job?.salary} TPM
) } export default LatestJobCards
